cards.title: Supplicate
powers: Reveal the top card of your deck. if it is yaojing or limited, move it to your hand. Otherwise, play it.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
Each player may discard 2 cards. Any player that does may play a card.

openingLines.default: if you are anything like your counterparts, this should be simple.

cards.title: Adjuration
body: You may draw a card.
Search your trash or deck for a yaojing card and put it in your hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle your deck.
You may play a card.

cards.title: Fox Spirit
body: at the start of your turn, this card deals itself or {Supplicate} 2 irreducible psychic damage.
at the end of your turn, you may draw a card.

cards.title: Gorilla Spirit
body: at the start of your turn, this card deals itself or {Supplicate} 2 irreducible psychic damage.
at the end of your turn, this card deals 1 target X melee damage, where X = the number of yaojing cards in your play area.
whenever a yaojing target would be dealt damage, you may redirect it to this card.

cards.title: Hare Spirit
body: at the start of your turn, this card deals itself or {Supplicate} 2 irreducible psychic damage.
at the end of your turn, you may play a card.

cards.title: Kraken Spirit
body: at the start of your turn, this card deals itself or {Supplicate} 2 irreducible psychic damage.
at the end of your turn, this card deals each non-hero target 1 melee damage. then, this card may deal each target 1 cold damage.

cards.title: Multiversal Koans
body: each player may destroy one of their ongoing or equipment cards. any who do may play a card.
each hero character may deal themself 2 psychic damage. any who take damage this way may use a power.
each player may discard a card. any who do may draw a card.

cards.title: Namcho Cycle
body: whenever one of your ongoing cards is destroyed, you may move it to the bottom of your deck, then move a yaojing from your trash to your hand.
whenever one of your yaojing cards is destroyed, you may move it to the bottom of your deck, then move an ongoing from your trash to your hand.

cards.title: Owl Spirit
body: at the start of your turn, this card deals itself or {Supplicate} 2 irreducible psychic damage.
at the end of your turn, reveal the top card of any two decks. discard one and replace the other.

cards.title: Punyam Staff
body: the first time any yaojing card deals damage each turn, {Supplicate} deals 1 target 2 radiant damage.
powers: {Supplicate} deals 1 target 1 melee damage. a yaojing card deals 1 target 2 psychic damage.

cards.title: Reality Weave
body: if a hero character would be dealt 3 or more damage from a single source, you may reduce that damage to 0. if you do, destroy this card.
powers: move 1 hero ongoing or equipment card from a trash to its owner's hand. 1 player may play a card.

cards.title: Togal Stride
body: you may move an environment card in play to the bottom of the environment deck.
reveal the top 3 cards of the environment deck. replace one, play one, and discard the rest.

cards.title: Tonglen Meditation
body: after psychic damage is dealt to {Supplicate} or a yaojing card, that card regains 1 hp.
powers: {Supplicate} and each yaojing target regains 1 hp. You may play a yaojing card.

cards.title: Tortoise Spirit
body: at the start of your turn, this card deals itself or {Supplicate} 2 irreducible psychic damage.
reduce damage dealt to {Supplicate} and yaojing cards by 1.
Damage dealt to yaojing cards cannot be increased.

cards.title: Trekcho Emptiness
body: Discard your hand. for each card discarded this way, 1 hero target regains 1 hp.
draw X cards, where X = the number of yaojing card in play plus 1.
if you drew fewer cards than you discarded, you may destroy an ongoing card.

cards.title: Winged Snake Spirit
body: at the start of your turn, this card deals itself or {Supplicate} 2 irreducible psychic damage.

at the end of your turn, discard up to 3 cards. this card deals X targets 1 toxic damage each, where X = the number of cards discarded this way. until the start of your next turn, reduce damage dealt by targets dealt damage this way by the damage they take.
